entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
